column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=My car had recently broke down and I had no mode of transportation , I needed to ride the bus to work everyday now .
#text=I had never rode the bus before so it was kind of a daunting experience .
#text=I looked up what I needed to do online , the first thing I needed to do was buy a bus pass in order to even ride the bus .
#text=After that it was relatively simple , I just had to wait for the bus that would take me nearest to my office building , and board it .
#text=Once I was on I just had to scan my pass and pick a seat .
#text=After that I just waited until I reached my stop and I got off of the bus .
#text=Once work was over I just did the same thing and got off at the stop as close to my house as possible .
#text=Riding the bus was not as scary as I thought it would be .
